reviews.review: Была отличная игра, пока она не стала бесплатной...

This game have fucking huge problem. Bcs i played this game in non-prime and i was so tired of fucking cheaters so i bought prime, but nothing changed. And it is cuz of that, when you play solo MM you have really big chance to catch some cheaters in to your team, so you will win and win more and more MMs, but than by that you are playing with cheaters your trust factor is getting lower and lower. So that mean you will play with and againts more cheaters. But it's not all you will be lose your rank, cuz someone from your team got banned. So in the result you will be losing over and over and if you luckly win some MM it will take your win and get you unranked, cuz you had cheater in your team. I'M HAPPY THAT I HAVE VALORANT YET, CUZ THIS WONT HAPPEN THERE!!

Впрочем начнём. КС Более и менее игра, но по моему мнению с отстойной физикой. Ты стреляешь и тут всё зависит от твоего везения. Если ты без прайма может попасться КУЧА КУЧЕЙ читеров. По графике геймплею и картам игра нормальная.
